name: WONGDOODY
description:
An agency with a name that sounds like a rare tropical fungal infection for example. WONGDOODY was founded in 1993, and since then we’ve proved that the unexpected can do some remarkable things. Whether in Seattle or Los Angeles, our 100 employees regularly use this approach to push client boundaries, disrupt convention, shatter expectations, start conversations, collect eyeballs and move consumers.
And in the process, we’ve become the most awarded independent advertising agency on the West Coast.
READ MORE...
